title: Banjo
description: A banjo with a round body and a long neck. Used to talk about banjos or music in general.

Appleâ€™s design imbues it with a tactile quality, showcasing the polished finish of the neck and the gleaming metal components with realistic lighting.  With its soft rounded edges and inviting appearance, this emoji evokes feelings of folk music, tradition, and casual, good-natured gatherings.
